New Records: De'Aaron Fox posted a franchise-record 60-point stat line just one day before the game against the Utah Jazz.
Key Match Events: De'Aaron Fox finished with 49 points, three rebounds, and nine assists in the game against the Utah Jazz.
The Sacramento Kings secured a narrow 121-117 win over the Utah Jazz.
The Utah Jazz dropped to a 3-9 record on the new year after the loss.
Post-Match Reflections: Jazz head coach Will Hardy praised De'Aaron Fox's performance and discussed the challenges of defending him.
Hardy mentioned the difficulty of adjusting to the Kings' lineup changes just hours before the game.
